% Table generated by Excel2LaTeX from sheet 'Main Results with  Defense'
\vspace{-4pt}
\begin{table}[htbp]
  \centering
  \resizebox{0.47\textwidth}{!}{
    \begin{tabular}{l|cc|cc|cc|cc}
    \toprule
    \multicolumn{1}{c|}{\multirow{2}[2]{*}{\textbf{Attacks + defense}}} & \multicolumn{2}{c|}{\textbf{Claude-v2}} & \multicolumn{2}{c|}{\textbf{Llama-3-70B}} & \multicolumn{2}{c|}{\textbf{GPT-4o}} & \multicolumn{2}{c}{\textbf{Average}} \\
          & \textbf{HS} & \textbf{ASR} & \textbf{HS} & \textbf{ASR} & \textbf{HS} & \textbf{ASR} & \textbf{HS} & \textbf{ASR} \\
    \midrule
    \midrule
            ArtPrompt & 3.44  & 52\%  & 3.8   & 58\% & 3.38  & 48\% & 3.54  & 53\% \\
            \textit{with} PPL-filter & 3.64  & 40\% & 2.58  & 26\%  & 2.88  & 30\%  & 3.03  & 32\% \\
            \textit{with} paraphrase & 1.6   & 8\%  & 3.94  & 34\%  & 3.88  & 42\%  & 3.91  & 28\% \\
            \textit{with} self-reminder & 1.08  & 0\% & 2.16  & 16\%  & 1.06  & 0\%  & 1.43  & 5\% \\
            \textit{with} rpo & 2.22   & 20\%  & 2.82  & 38\%  & 3.88  & 52\%  & 2.97  & 37\% \\
    \midrule
            SATA-MLM & 3.86  & 68\%  & 4.6   & 82\%  & 4.36  & 82\%  & 4.27  & 77\% \\
            \textit{with} PPL-filter & 3.8   & 66\%  & \textbf{4.54}  & \textbf{82}\%  & \textbf{4.54}  & \textbf{84}\%  & 4.29  & \textbf{77}\% \\
            \textit{with} paraphrase & 3.36  & 38\% & \textbf{4.26}  & \textbf{66}\%  & 4.22  & 70\%  & 3.95  & 58\% \\
            \textit{with} self-reminder & \textbf{1.66}   & \textbf{8}\%  & 2.08  & \textbf{18}\%  & \textbf{2.28}  & \textbf{26}\%  & \textbf{2.01}  & \textbf{17}\% \\
            \textit{with} rpo & 3.38  & 56\% & 4.08  & \textbf{72}\%  & 4.2  & \textbf{74}\%  & 3.89  & \textbf{67}\% \\
    \midrule
            SATA-ELP & 4.54  & 86\%  & 3.82  & 62\%  & 4.56  & 78\% & 4.31  & 75\% \\
            \textit{with} PPL-filter & \textbf{4.48}  & \textbf{84}\%  & 4.08  & 64\%  & 4.48  & 78\%  & \textbf{4.35}  & 75\% \\
            \textit{with} paraphrase & \textbf{4.06}  & \textbf{64}\%  & 3.34  & 48\%  & \textbf{4.62}  & \textbf{78}\%  & \textbf{4.01}  & \textbf{63}\% \\
            \textit{with} self-reminder & 1.44  & 6\%  & \textbf{2.54}  & 16\%  & 1.38  & 2\%  & 1.79  & 8\% \\
            \textit{with} rpo & \textbf{4.28}  & \textbf{72}\%  & 3.7  & 58\%  & \textbf{4.28}  & 68\%  & \textbf{4.09}  & 66\% \\
    \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}%
    }
    \caption{HS and ASR of baseline vs. SATA under the windowed PPL-filter, paraphrase, self-reminder and robust prompt optimization (rpo) defenses. Results are reported with the \texttt{ensemble} configuration on AdvBench.}
    \vspace{-12pt}
  \label{tab:main-defense}%
\end{table}%
